name: ServiceZilla
overview:
ServiceZilla is a community forum where Clients and Service Providers can connect.

ServiceZilla provides up to date listings on products all over the country in hundreds of industries. ServiceZilla offers a unique bidding format that benefits the Client as well as Service Providers.

No more trying to track down who you know that has a “Friend in the Business”, with ServiceZilla they are “Your Friend in the Business”. Post an ad and receive bids from local contractors from there you can view their profile, photo gallery and view the feedback from said service provider. All of this without even leaving the comfort of your home or office.

Beyond the typical bidding, ServiceZilla keeps ranking and feedback on all service providers, which allows anyone looking to get a project completed with updated information and feedback from their neighbors.

ServiceZilla is not a directory and goes far beyond the phone book. ServiceZilla provides up to date listings on projects all over the country in hundreds of industries.
